results.content: Un profe que escribe cada línea de código, todo a puro pedal, me encantó el curso. excelente forma de enseñar, gracias maestro.

results.content: I found this course practically very well explained. The content is good, the instructor could be a little loud while explaining otherwise coding is explained in a simple way, good for a beginner to learn coding for a project
